import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { CoreContext } from "./Core"; function TimeCard(props) { const updateFields = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); let start = document.getElementById("start").value let end = document.getElementById("end").value props.context.setPayPeriodStart(start) props.context.setPayPeriodEnd(end) } return(
